title: When sorting Champions after Alphabet, Mastery Level is broken
body:
https://imgur.com/a/3cmvpx0

The first screenshot shows the broken search, second one the correct one.

If i sort by mastery, yuumi is lvl 3 and sorty by alphabet shes lvl 0.
